home.subText: AFS's mission is to offer the best-performing foils, boards and wings, while guaranteeing first-rate accessibility and stability. To ensure that all riders can practice their sport in complete safety, whatever the conditions and whatever their riding style (freeride, carving, downwind, surf foil, etc.). These products are designed and manufactured in Brittany, France, by Foil And Co. French manufacturing using the most advanced techniques to offer you the best quality!
